title: HEAT-Hot Water INCLUDED for asap or 8-15-22 (1 bd-1bth)

First Month $1,450.00, Last Month's rent $1,450.00 and Security Deposit $500.00  (2nd Floor)
NO PERSONAL CHECKS, NO credit or debit cards accepted, Future rental payments
accepted by money order or certified bank check, NO PERSONAL CHECKS accepted.
ONE (1) YEAR minimum lease agreement (Both units)
1 or 2 persons minimum to occupy ONE bedroom unit.
Phone calls 10am-3pm Mon-Fri, 508-584-1095
Wk-ends we try to accomodate 10am-NOON feel free to leave a message also,
